text: Come now, you rich! Weep and cry aloud over the miseries that are coming on you.

<st data-num="4771" class="">Your</st> <st data-num="4149" class="">riches</st> have <st data-num="4595" class="">rotted</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="2440" class="">clothing</st> has <st data-num="1096" class="">become</st> <st data-num="4598" class="">moth-eaten</st>.

<st data-num="4771" class="">Your</st> <st data-num="5557" class="">gold</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="696" class="">silver</st> have <st data-num="2728" class="">rusted</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="846" class="">their</st> <st data-num="2447" class="">rust</st> will <st data-num="1510" class="">be</st> a <st data-num="3142" class="">witness</st> against <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>. It will <st data-num="2068">consume</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="4561" class="">flesh</st> <st data-num="5613" class="">like</st> <st data-num="4442" class="">fire</st>. It is <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="2078" class="">last</st> <st data-num="2250" class="">days</st> that you have <st data-num="2343">hoarded treasure</st>!<n id="1" />

<st data-num="2400" class="">Look</st>, the <st data-num="3408" class="">pay</st> you have <st data-num="650" class="">held back</st> from the <st data-num="2040" class="">workers</st> who <st data-num="270" class="">mowed</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="5561" class="">fields</st> <st data-num="2896">cries out</st> <st data-num="575" class="">against</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> the <st data-num="995" class="">cries</st> of the <st data-num="2325" class="">reapers</st> have <st data-num="1525" class="">reached</st> the <st data-num="3775" class="">ears</st> of the <st data-num="2962" class="">Lord</st> of <st data-num="4519">Heaven’s Armies</st>.<n id="1" />

You have <st data-num="5171">lived indulgently</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="4684" class="">luxuriously</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">on</st> the <st data-num="1093" class="">earth</st>. You have <st data-num="5142" class="">fattened</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="2588" class="">hearts</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> a <st data-num="2250" class="">day</st> of <st data-num="4967" class="">slaughter</st>.<n id="1" />
You have condemned and murdered the righteous person, although he does not resist you.
So be patient, brothers and sisters, until the Lord’s return. Think of how the farmer waits for the precious fruit of the ground and is patient for it until it receives the early and late rains.

<st data-num="4771" class="">You</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">also</st> be <st data-num="3114" class="">patient</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="4741" class="">strengthen</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="2588" class="">hearts</st>, <st data-num="3754" class="">for</st> the <st data-num="2962">Lord’s</st> <st data-num="3952" class="">return</st> is <st data-num="1448" class="">near</st>.

Do <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> <st data-num="4727" class="">grumble</st> <st data-num="2596" class="">against</st> <st data-num="240">one another</st>, <st data-num="80">brothers and sisters</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="2443">so that</st> you may <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> be <st data-num="2919" class="">judged</st>. <st data-num="2400" class="">See</st>, the <st data-num="2923" class="">judge</st> <st data-num="2476" class="">stands</st> <st data-num="4253" class="">before</st> the <st data-num="2374" class="">gates</st>!<n id="2" />

As an <st data-num="5262" class="">example</st> of <st data-num="2552" class="">suffering</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3115" class="">patience</st>, <st data-num="80">brothers and sisters</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="2983" class="">take</st> the <st data-num="4396" class="">prophets</st> <st data-num="3739" class="">who</st> <st data-num="2980" class="">spoke</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="2962">Lord’s</st> <st data-num="3686" class="">name</st>.
Think of how we regard as blessed those who have endured. You have heard of Job’s endurance and you have seen the Lord’s purpose, that the Lord is full of compassion and mercy.
And above all, my brothers and sisters, do not swear, either by heaven or by earth or by any other oath. But let your “Yes” be yes and your “No” be no, so that you may not fall into judgment.
Is anyone among you suffering? He should pray. Is anyone in good spirits? He should sing praises.

Is <st data-num="5100" class="">anyone</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">among</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="770" class="">ill</st>? He should <st data-num="4341" class="">summon</st> the <st data-num="4245" class="">elders</st> of the <st data-num="1577" class="">church</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> they should <st data-num="4336" class="">pray</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">for</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> and <st data-num="218" class="">anoint</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> with <st data-num="1637">olive oil</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="3686" class="">name</st> of the <st data-num="2962" class="">Lord</st>.

<st data-num="2532" class="">And</st> the <st data-num="2171" class="">prayer</st> of <st data-num="4102" class="">faith</st> will <st data-num="4982" class="">save</st> the one who is <st data-num="2577" class="">sick</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> the <st data-num="2962" class="">Lord</st> will <st data-num="1453" class="">raise</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> <st data-num="1453" class="">up</st>—<st data-num="2579">and if</st> he <st data-num="1510">has</st> <st data-num="4160" class="">committed</st> <st data-num="266" class="">sins</st>, <st data-num="846">he</st> will be <st data-num="863" class="">forgiven</st>.<n id="1" />

<st data-num="3767" class="">So</st> <st data-num="1843" class="">confess</st> your <st data-num="266" class="">sins</st> to <st data-num="240" class="">one another</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="4336" class="">pray</st> <st data-num="5228" class="">for</st> <st data-num="240" class="">one another</st> <st data-num="3704" class="">so that</st> you may be <st data-num="2390" class="">healed</st>. The <st data-num="1162" class="">prayer</st> of a <st data-num="1342" class="">righteous person</st> <st data-num="1754">has</st> <st data-num="4183" class="">great</st> <st data-num="2480" class="">effectiveness</st>.<n id="1" />

<st data-num="2243" class="">Elijah</st> was a <st data-num="444">human being</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="3663" class="">like</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">us</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> he <st data-num="4336" class="">prayed</st> <st data-num="4335" class="">earnestly</st><n id="2" /> that it would <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> <st data-num="1026" class="">rain</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> there was <st data-num="3756" class="">no</st> <st data-num="1026" class="">rain</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">on</st> the <st data-num="1093" class="">land</st> for <st data-num="5140" class="">three</st> <st data-num="1763" class="">years</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1803" class="">six</st> <st data-num="3376" class="">months</st>!
Then he prayed again, and the sky gave rain and the land sprouted with a harvest.
My brothers and sisters, if anyone among you wanders from the truth and someone turns him back,
he should know that the one who turns a sinner back from his wandering path will save that person’s soul from death and will cover a multitude of sins.
